snippet: The party’s antigraft agency said Thursday that Liu Tienan, a powerful Chinese economic planning official, took bribes and abused his power.
abstract: Chinese economic planning official Liu Tienan is expelled from Communist Party and removed from public office over accusations of corruption made public by journalist Luo Changping.
lead_paragraph: The party’s antigraft agency said Thursday that Liu Tienan, a powerful Chinese economic planning official, took bribes and abused his power.
